title: Interpretation of a dream about a crocodile by Ibn Sirin and leading scholars

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a crocodile The crocodile is a predatory amphibious animal belonging to the reptiles and has a long body covered with huge scales and short legs and has sharp teeth that make it happy to eat its prey and seeing a crocodile in a dream causes terror to the dreamer's soul and causes him to wonder about the meanings and associations accompanying this dream, and whether it brings him good or evil, all of which we will answer this and more details in the following lines of the article. Interpretation of a dream about a crocodile The interpretations of jurists in seeing a crocodile in a dream are many, the most important of which are the following: Seeing a crocodile in a dream symbolizes the bad events that the dreamer will experience in the coming period, which will turn his life upside down, as well as persecution by an unjust ruler. And whoever sees in a dream that a crocodile attacks him and he cannot escape from it, this is a sign of the state of sadness and sorrow that will befall him in the coming days, which will be a reason for exposing one of his family members. A difficult health problem that may lead to his death, God forbid. Seeing a crocodile in a dream means deceiving friends or relatives and the extent of hatred and malice in their chest towards the dreamer. If you dream of a large crocodile, this is a sign that you are on the wrong path, and you are preoccupied with worldly pleasures and enjoyments and your shortcomings towards your Lord, so you must hasten to repent before it is too late. Interpretation of a dream about a crocodile by Ibn Sirin The scholar Muhammad bin Sirin mentioned several interpretations of seeing a crocodile in a dream, the most important of which are: Whoever sees a crocodile in a dream, this is a sign that he is being chased by a policeman and will suffer great injustice in his life. Seeing a crocodile bite while sleeping symbolizes the exacerbation of the dreamer's illness and the approaching date of his death, God forbid. When a person sees a huge crocodile in a dream, this indicates that there is a person in his life who does not wish him well at all and always seeks to harm him. Seeing a crocodile on the ground while sleeping indicates the dreamer's ability to overcome his opponent and enemy in reality. Interpretation of a dream about a crocodile by Al-Nabulsi Imam Al-Nabulsi - may God have mercy on him - says in interpreting a dream about a crocodile that it is an indication that the dreamer He committed many sins and transgressions in his life and went astray from the path of truth. Seeing crocodiles in a dream also symbolizes the state of anxiety, worry and distress that dominates the dreamer and exposes him to a difficult financial crisis in the coming period. If you dream of a crocodile dragging you with him in the water, this is a sign of injustice by one of the rulers on his rights and feeling angry and hateful because of that. If you see in your dream that you are eating crocodile meat, this indicates that you will earn a lot of money in the coming days. What is the interpretation of seeing a crocodile in a dream for a single woman? Scholars mentioned in the interpretation of the dream of a crocodile for an unmarried woman that it is a sign of shame, scandal or betrayal by a dear person she trusted a lot. If the girl dreams of a dead crocodile, this indicates the bad psychological state that the dreamer suffers from in this period of her life and the feeling of distress, sadness and depression. If a girl dreams that a crocodile is trying to eat her but she was able to get away from it and was not harmed, this is a sign that she will get away from

title: Interpretation of a dream about washing a child’s hair in a dream

preview.html: Dream interpretation of washing a child’s hair in a dream Scientists give different meanings to what you see, as it may have promising meanings or not. We present below the interpretation of a dream about washing a child’s hair in a dream.Interpretation of a dream about washing a child’s hair in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about washing a child’s hair in a dream Washing hair can express repentance for sins, and God knows the unseen. Also, seeing hair washed indicates good circumstances, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing a married woman Washing her hair is evidence of comfort, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees herself washing her short hair, she can get rid of anxiety, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about washing carpets with soap and water in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about washing carpets with soap and water in a dream is evidence of praiseworthy things, God willing. If the dreamer dreams of washing Carpets with water and soap may lead to a high status, and God knows the unseen. It can also express the attainment of a high status, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If an unmarried girl is seen washing carpets with water, perhaps it is food, and God knows best. It could also be a sign of goodness and livelihood, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about washing a child. Of excrement in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a child washing excrement in a dream can lead to good deeds, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer dreams of washing his child with water, then he will be cared for, and God knows best. If a married woman is seen washing the child of her excrement, she will recover, and God knows the unseen. When you see a child washing excrement in a dream, This may indicate the release of anxiety, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about washing dishes in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about washing dishes in a dream could be evidence of purity, and God knows the unseen. When a single girl sees herself washing the dishes in a dream, this could be evidence of cleanliness and purity. And God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees herself. You wash the dishes, as this may be evidence of good changes, and God knows the unseen. Also, seeing washing dishes in a dream can mean that it can lead to the satisfaction of desires, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about washing clothes with milk in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about washing clothes with milk in a dream and washing with milk can indicate To get rid of sins, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees herself washing with milk, then she may avoid mistake, and God knows best. If a divorced woman sees herself washing with milk, this may be a sign that she is far from committing sins and that God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about washing the vagina with milk in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about washing The vagina with milk in a dream. We did not find clear meanings that scholars see, except that seeing a milk bath can lead to goodness, and God knows best. Washing with milk means getting rid of sins and transgressions, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When you dream of washing yourself with milk, this may be a sign of abandoning sins, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about washing feet with milk in Dream Interpretation of a dream about washing feet with milk in a dream could be a sign of kindness. As walking on the straight path might suggest, God is also All-Knowing. If a young man sees himself in a dream

title: Interpretation of seeing a man in military uniform in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a man wearing a military uniform in a dream. Wearing a military uniform in a dream can symbolize many interpretations. It can lead to achieving goals and reaching a prominent position. The military uniform can also indicate victory over enemies, and in the following lines we will talk with you about his interpretation of the dream of army uniform. Official in its various forms, and we explain it according to the dreamer’s social status. We also show you the interpretation of military action and the dream of fear for soldiers. For more interpretations, follow this article. Seeing a man wearing a military uniform in a dream When the dreamer sees someone he knows wearing military clothing in a dream, this may be a sign that this man will fulfill his desires and ambitions. If you dream of a man wearing a military uniform in a dream, it may be This is a sign that the dreamer aspires to reach the Military College, and if one sees in a dream that a man is wearing a military uniform, this may mean that the dreamer has many friends who work in the army. A man wearing a military uniform in a dream may indicate that the dreamer desires In reaching a prestigious position in the future or aiming to be a successful man with a stable personality and the ability to control and control. Seeing a man in military uniform in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. If the dreamer is exposed to oppression and injustice and sees in a dream that there is a man standing in front of him in military uniform, this may be a sign of... The victory of the oppressed and the emergence of the truth. Dreaming of a man wearing a military uniform in a dream could be a sign that the dreamer is a person who loves challenge and adventure in his life. Seeing a number of men wearing military uniforms in a dream and standing in rows in front of the dreamer may indicate that his freedom is restricted and he cannot express From his opinion. Whoever sees in a dream that there is a man wearing a military uniform, but he was larger than his size and fell from his body, this indicates the emergence of some problems and obstacles that stand in the way of the dreamer. Seeing a man wearing a military uniform in a single woman’s dreamWhen a girl sees a man wearing a military uniform Standing next to her, this may mean that she can marry a man with a strong personality and the ability to take responsibility. If a Virgo sees in a dream that a man is talking to her and is wearing a military uniform, this indicates that there is an ambitious and prestigious man who will ask to marry her and this girl will agree to this request. A girl’s dream that a man wears a military uniform in a dream and shoots her in a dream indicates that she will be punished by her family because of the mistakes she has committed. A strange man wearing a military uniform in a dream for the dreamer, this may indicate that there is someone who will help her achieve what this girl aspires to. Interpretation of a dream about accepting a military job for a single woman. When a single girl dreams of being accepted into a military job, this could be a sign that she has a strong personality and the ability to make the right decisions. If a girl sees that she has been accepted into a military job, this may mean that she will reach an excellent position. In the community and find a new job. Seeing an unmarried woman is...

title: A herd of cows in a dream

preview.html: A herd of cows in a dream is an important dream that we must delve into in its interpretation, which is what we will do in the following lines, and present with it the most important opinions of scholars and translators specialized in the field of dream interpretation. A herd of cows in a dream A herd of cows in a dream is one of the dreams in which you must stop and know Its most important meanings and interpretations, and we present some of them as follows: When a person sees a herd of cows in a dream, it has a distinctive and attractive shape. This dream indicates prosperity, goodness, abundance of sustenance and blessings in it, and it symbolizes a great symbol of the material gains that the dreamer will acquire in his life. In a dream, he may A person sees cows and a herd of cows grazing in the fields. This is a clear indication and message of the great opportunity that the fortuneteller has in the future to achieve his various goals and objectives. Likewise, seeing a cow in a dream with long horns walking in a herd. Seeing this dream indicates family disputes that the person will face with His wife if he is married. If he is single, this indicates a lack of reconciliation in his love life. Also, a woman sees in a dream a herd of cows and destroys one of them. This is evidence of her good life full of goodness and blessings, and that she is a woman who sanctifies married life and takes care of her children and husband. She may be Interested in: Escaping from a cow in a dream. A herd of cows in a dream for a single woman. Some interpreters came about dreaming of a herd of cows in a dream and seeing an unmarried woman. Some of their interpretations were as follows: Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream in front of her a herd of cows in vast fields. This dream is a sign. That she will achieve the goals she aspires to. Also, a single woman sees in a dream a herd of cows, and she was a student studying. This dream indicates that she will be very successful in her studies and will excel in them. And if an unmarried woman sees in her dream a herd of cows with fat calves. This An indication that she is entering a new phase in her life and that she will succeed in it, whether that is marriage, an emotional connection, or joining a new job. Unmarried women may also see in a dream that there is a herd of cows with large horns that someone is chasing. This dream is an indication of the evil that will approach them. And it will happen to her in her life and it will be from someone close to her. Seeing a herd of cows in a dream for an unmarried woman will lead her to the right path. This dream is a sign that she will occupy an excellent leadership position in her new job. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a raging cow that wants to be A herd of cows in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a herd of cows in a dream for a married woman has many important connotations and signs in the life of a married woman, including: If a married woman sees in a dream a herd of cows walking on huge farms. This dream has significance. Great for the goodness that this woman will see in her life and that the blessing will be upon her family and children. Likewise, a married woman saw a herd of cows that looked weak and sick. This indicates that

title: How do I know it's a vision?

preview.html: How do I know that my dream is a true vision? The dream is a revelation from God Almighty to the dreamer, because it differs from any dream that the dreamer dreams of dreams or lost dreams. The Noble Prophetic Sunnah has distinguished between dreams and dreams, and the vision is from God Almighty and there is no room for interpretation in it. Dreams differ from dreams, that dreams come from Satan, and the dream can be a simulation of the soul. The vision is distinguished as fully realized when the dreamer wakes up from his sleep and remembers all its details. The events of the vision are clear, sequential and more realistic, unlike imaginary and mysterious dreams. Dreams, including true and correct dreams, and false dreams that fall into dream tubes. Personal matters, or those related to food, drink and clothing, are never visions, but are called a conversation with the soul. The interpretation of the dream is one and it is as it appears in the dream, while dreams have more than one interpretation according to the status of the dreamer. The vision is a beautiful thing and it carries good news for the dreamer and perhaps a major change in his life. And among the prophets are those who saw the dream and it came true, so the vision is mentioned in the Holy Qur’an, and it is considered one of The missionaries. The vision is related to the righteous and the neighbors of God. See also: Dawn Reasons for the true vision The vision is that which represents the righteous servants of God and is limited to people whose condition is correct and whose faith is correct. The dream is limited to the honest man who is honest in his words and actions. It came in the Sunnah in the language of the Prophet Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace: The most sincere of you in the vision, and the most truthful of you in speech. The person close to God Almighty is the one who has the most dreams. And the vision has come true as it is, there is no change in it, as it came in the saying of the Messenger Muhammad, that it comes like the dawn of dawn. The dreamer should hide the dream and wait until it comes true. How do I treat the vision? The dreamer should be grateful when he sees the vision. It is recommended in the dream that the dreamer tells the people he loves and begins to tell the dream about them. It was mentioned in the inaccurate dream that it was not addressed in it because it is from Satan and its purpose is to bring sadness to the dreamer's heart. The dreamer should not think too much about the dream and not be sad. All the dreamer has to do is seek refuge from the accursed Satan three times, and blow to his left three times. On the authority of the Prophet Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace, he said: Whoever sees A dream he does not like, let him blow to his left three times. An unrealistic dream is not recommended to be narrated. When the dreamer wakes up, he should change the direction of his sleep or change the position of his body or his bed completely. It is recommended for him to perform ablution and pray to God, striking him until the evil he saw is removed from him. Read also: The difference between a vision and a dream and talking about the soul Distinguish between a true and false vision Every person sees in a dream a dream that is either real or he dreams of it or dreams about it. It has been proven by interpreters and scholars that the true vision is the one that comes from God and is fulfilled at the beginning of the day. As for the unrealistic dream, it never comes true and its source is from Satan. There is no human intervention in either vision. The unrealistic dream is the disturbing nightmares that make a person anxious and have no solution

Every person sees in a dream a dream that is either real, or he is dreaming about it, or he is dreaming about it. It has been proven by commentators and scholars that the real vision is the one that comes from God and comes true at the beginning of the day. As for the unrealistic dream, it never comes true and its source is from Satan. There is no human intervention in either vision. The unrealistic dream is the annoying nightmares that afflict a person. She is worried and has no money

title: Interpretation of seeing a white cat in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: A white cat in a dream is one of the dreams that carry a variety of interpretations, including positive and negative, knowing that cats are pets that attract everyone’s attention, and today through our website we will point out the most important interpretations that the vision carries for both men and women depending on the difference in social status. A white cat in a dream is seeing a cat White in a dream is a promising dream that indicates that you will receive a large number of good news in the coming period, in addition to a radical improvement in the dreamer’s life from worst to best. Seeing a white cat in a married woman’s dream is a praiseworthy dream that indicates that she is living a happy married life. Ibn Shaheen showed in his interpretation of the white cat in a dream that the dreamer has a friend who is currently trying to deceive and harm her. As for whoever sees himself scratching the white cat, this indicates that the dreamer is exposed to an illness and it is difficult to recover from it, as the treatment will take a long period and a longer period of recovery. White cats in a dream It is a sign that the dreamer will be exposed to lies and deception from people he trusts a lot. Seeing white cats in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will face a large number of problems in the future in addition to the problems he is currently facing. The dream usually indicates that he will receive a series of bad news that will affect Negatively on his life. Seeing a white wild cat in a dream is a sign that the dreamer is unable to solve his problems. White cat in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Ibn Sirin explained that seeing a white cat in a dream is one of the visions that carries a number of interpretations, including positive and negative. Here are the most important of them: White cats in a dream mean receiving a series of unpleasant news that will negatively affect the dreamer’s life. Ibn Sirin says that seeing calm white cats in a dream is a sign of the dreamer’s success in life and that luck will be on his side and he will be able to achieve all his goals. The dream usually indicates a series of positive changes in the dreamer's life, which means that life will move from one stage to another that is much better. Seeing wild white cats in a dream is clear evidence that the dreamer will face many difficulties in his life, but they will die. Calm cats in a dream It is a clear sign that the dreamer is in dire need of love by entering into a romantic relationship. Seeing unclean cats indicates the presence of fraudsters in the dreamer’s life who conspire against him and conspire against him to get him into trouble. A white cat in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried woman sees a white cat in her dream , it means that she is surrounded by many hypocrites around her who are always looking to harm her. Seeing a white cat is a symbol of having a friend who shows her love, but inside her there is indescribable hatred and great hatred. If an unmarried woman sees that she is driving a white cat out of her house, This means that she will live in a state of psychological stability and happiness is approaching her, and she will live many happy, peaceful days. Seeing small white kittens in a dream for a young woman

title: Interpretation of dreams about individual shopping

preview.html: Is shopping a dream interpretation for a single woman? A good or bad sign? Dreams, regardless of their content, always mean a certain message that the viewer must understand, because it could be one of the signs that he desperately needs something in his life, perhaps to follow a new path or to avoid the envy and hatred that was necessary. For him, in this article, the encyclopedia website offers you the full explanation. This is a dream of a single girl. Interpretation of dreams for individual shoppingShopping generally means the desires that we always seek in our lives and refers to human needs that we lack but cannot express. If the unmarried girl sees in what the sleeping person sees that she was shopping with one of her relatives, whether it is her father or Her mother, and she was robbed, it means that a suitor will come soon, but this suitor will be the reason for this. It eliminates her dreams and aspirations in life. Girls today are not like in the past, which limited the role of women to serving meals at home. Today, every girl seeks to have a separate entity from her family and even her husband, but the suitor who will come to you does not like these modern theories, so you must think Always with your head and not your heart! An unmarried girl who sees herself shopping to buy a gift for one of her relatives or friends means that she and that person have a useless love and that the dreamer has a special passion in her heart for this person, so he sees in it. Her dream is that she is trying to make him happy with any gift, no matter how simple. Anyone who sees in his dream that she is shopping but needs money to buy what she wants, this means that she has to do a lot of work and try to get what she wants. This girl in her life is not making enough effort, and perhaps Her plans are not as effective as they should be, especially if she is trying for something big and has high ambitions, so she needs attention so that she can really reach the goal. She wants. Seeing sales when shopping but not wanting to buy something new means that you see life too narrowly and do not take advantage of opportunities properly. It is normal for people to buy in the presence of offers, especially if they need some basic items, but few Your desire to shop despite your need means that you are a stubborn personality and never think straight, which will make you pay the price. Price later. Try to read about the mental fallacies of humans and learn about the caveman fallacy that will free you from stubbornness and reopen your way of thinking about things around you. Interpretation of dreams about shopping in a clothing store for individuals Who among us does not like clothes, specifically we women always want more and do not say no to bulky things, as clothes are one of Pleasures that we cannot do without, but what do clothes mean in a dream? Watch the wedding dress market: A wedding dress is a type of clothing, but it is not a traditional dress, but a wonderful dress that every girl dreams of from the first day of her life. So seeing the dress and buying it means that you want to get married and this is a dream about your special day and you do not expect it to be
